text.p: Medaphis Corp said on Wednesday an initial public offering of the company's entire interest in its Healthcare Recoveries Inc subsidiary would involve 9.8 million shares priced at $14 a share.
Medaphis said it would use net after-tax proceeds of about $115 million to reduce outstanding bank debt, satisfying a scheduled July 31 step-down payment required in its senior bank credit facility.
Healthcare Recoveries provides subrogation and related recovery services to private healthcare payors.
Atlanta-based Medaphis provides business management services and information products to healthcare providers.
